channel.title: [317] Heretic (was SherzScape)
channel.description:
[URL=http://img593.imageshack.us/i/heretic.jpg/][IMG]http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/2994/heretic.jpg[/img][/URL]
[size=10pt]Development stalled due to inability to turn character (I don't know how to do it). I've posted a help thread -> [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,485977.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,485977.0.html[/url]. Once I've worked out how to do that I'll continue work.[/size]
[b]NEW NAME: [/b] If you don't like it, please suggest changes!
[b][size=18pt]Intro[/size][/b]
Based upon TestScape. All skills are being re-written. Once finished, this RSPS will aim to have the following:
[b][size=18pt]Long Term Goals[/size][/b]
1. All skills working [##########] 2. Wilderness & full player attacking (including magic) [##########] 3. Working website for users with donation system [##########] 4. NPC system - following, attacking, special NPCs (e.g. ranging & magic using NPCs). [##########] 5. Working quests (including repeatable quests - possibility of daily quests) [##########]
[b][size=18pt]Currently Working On[/size][/b]
1. Web-based control panel [UserCP, Game Login, Password Change, Admin] 2. GraveRobber mini-game [Thieving, Timed Challenge, Bonuses, Better Entry Location] 3. Woodcutting [Animation, Looking at Tree, Chopping, Tree Renewal] 4. Tutorial island mini-quest game introduction [Gathering Object ID's, Coding Key Finding, Testing]
[b][size=18pt]Completed[/size][/b]
1. Full MySQL loading and saving [Loading, Saving, Bans]
[b][size=18pt]Screenshots[/size][/b]
[URL=http://img215.imageshack.us/i/screenshotli.jpg/][IMG]http://img215.imageshack.us/img215/3751/screenshotli.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img218.imageshack.us/i/screenshot050411182220.png/][IMG width=400 height=380]http://img218.imageshack.us/img218/9504/screenshot050411182220.png[/img][/URL]
[b][size=18pt]Changes[/size][/b]
[code] * [UNKNOWN] * - Renamed files to have the same naming conventions. * - Removed most warnings. * - Removed depreciated getBytes. * - Formatted all files. * [01/04/2011] * - Removed old commands. * - Added command not found notice. * - Moved all admin commands to one section. * - Created a commands XML document. * [02/04/2011] * - Fixed all teleports for correct EXP. * - Re-wrote teleport code to save space. * - Moved objects to ObjectHandler * - Removed most of Cooking, Herblore, Magic, Mining, Prayer, Smithing and Woodcutting to fix at a later date * - Changed right-click on play to show "Kick" if the player is moderator or above * - Removed excessive menus - one central help menu * [03/04/2011] * - Moved most character loading & saving to MySQL database * - Changed having no weapon to "None" on player equip screen * - Removed moreinfo system * - Added limit of 1 connection per IP * - Fixed ban to work with MySQL system * [04/04/2011] * - Removed fletching, remaining parts of cooking * - Removed training on doors, hay and dummies * - Removed separate connectedFrom saving * - Added GraveRobber minigame * - Moved starting place to Entrana * [05/04/2011] * - Removed farming * - Added GoodDistance to GraveRobber - you can't click from anywhere & added more time (each game is now 3 mins) * - Removed crafting * - Moved all emotes to EmoteHandler * - Removed frame testing functions - not needed at this time * - Added password changing and user control panel to the online workings[/code]
[b][size=18pt]Suggestions Needed For[/size][/b]
- How the GraveRobber mini-game can be improved. - A woodcutting mini-game. - RSPS name. - Next skill to work on (after woodcutting is completed)
[b][size=18pt]Download[/size][/b]
Updated daily (if changes were made):
[url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/2242914/SherzScape.tar.gz]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/2242914/SherzScape.tar.gz[/url]

item.title: [317] Heretic (was SherzScape)
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“jSherz, post:10, topic:389479”][quote author=Squirt Ltd link=topic=485393.msg3557652#msg3557652 date=1302024829]

Long Term Goals

  1. All skills working
    2. PvP system with points and highscores
  2. Working website for users with donation system
    4. Upgrade to later client versions
  3. NPC system - following, attacking, special NPCs (e.g. ranging & magic using NPCs).

u should change the name to something without -scape
[/quote]

The name is only temporary while I develop it. If I find that, while I’m making it, I get inspiration for another one or it branches off into another area then I’ll change it. By the crossed out goals do you mean to not do those two goals? What is wrong with upgrading to newer client versions?[/quote]
New client versions are the reason most people quit runescape in the first place.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Heretic (was SherzScape)
item.dc:creator: @jSherz jSherz
item.description:
@jSherz wrote:

[size=10pt]Development stalled due to inability to turn character (I don’t know how to do it). I’ve posted a help thread -> http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,485977.0.html. Once I’ve worked out how to do that I’ll continue work.[/size]

NEW NAME: If you don’t like it, please suggest changes!

[size=18pt]Intro[/size]

Based upon TestScape. All skills are being re-written. Once finished, this RSPS will aim to have the following:

[size=18pt]Long Term Goals[/size]

  1. All skills working [##########]
  2. Wilderness & full player attacking (including magic) [##########]
  3. Working website for users with donation system [##########]
  4. NPC system - following, attacking, special NPCs (e.g. ranging & magic using NPCs). [##########]
  5. Working quests (including repeatable quests - possibility of daily quests) [##########]

[size=18pt]Currently Working On[/size]

  1. Web-based control panel [UserCP, Game Login, Password Change, Admin]
  2. GraveRobber mini-game [Thieving, Timed Challenge, Bonuses, Better Entry Location]
  3. Woodcutting [Animation, Looking at Tree, Chopping, Tree Renewal]
  4. Tutorial island mini-quest game introduction [Gathering Object ID’s, Coding Key Finding, Testing]

[size=18pt]Completed[/size]

  1. Full MySQL loading and saving [Loading, Saving, Bans]

[size=18pt]Screenshots[/size]


[size=18pt]Changes[/size]

[code] * [UNKNOWN]

    • Renamed files to have the same naming conventions.
    • Removed most warnings.
    • Removed depreciated getBytes.
    • Formatted all files.
  • [01/04/2011]
    • Removed old commands.
    • Added command not found notice.
    • Moved all admin commands to one section.
    • Created a commands XML document.
  • [02/04/2011]
    • Fixed all teleports for correct EXP.
    • Re-wrote teleport code to save space.
    • Moved objects to ObjectHandler
    • Removed most of Cooking, Herblore, Magic, Mining, Prayer, Smithing and Woodcutting to fix at a later date
    • Changed right-click on play to show “Kick” if the player is moderator or above
    • Removed excessive menus - one central help menu
  • [03/04/2011]
    • Moved most character loading & saving to MySQL database
    • Changed having no weapon to “None” on player equip screen
    • Removed moreinfo system
    • Added limit of 1 connection per IP
    • Fixed ban to work with MySQL system
  • [04/04/2011]
    • Removed fletching, remaining parts of cooking
    • Removed training on doors, hay and dummies
    • Removed separate connectedFrom saving
    • Added GraveRobber minigame
    • Moved starting place to Entrana
  • [05/04/2011]
    • Removed farming
    • Added GoodDistance to GraveRobber - you can’t click from anywhere & added more time (each game is now 3 mins)
    • Removed crafting
    • Moved all emotes to EmoteHandler
    • Removed frame testing functions - not needed at this time
    • Added password changing and user control panel to the online workings[/code]

[size=18pt]Suggestions Needed For[/size]

  • How the GraveRobber mini-game can be improved.
  • A woodcutting mini-game.
  • RSPS name.
  • Next skill to work on (after woodcutting is completed)

[size=18pt]Download[/size]

Updated daily (if changes were made):

http://dl.dropbox.com/u/2242914/SherzScape.tar.gz

Read full topic
